changeSet.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.COASTAL_LOCATION_TRITON', 'U') IS NULL CREATE TABLE ${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.COASTAL_LOCATION_TRITON ( ID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT NEWID(), FFFS_LOC_ID NVARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, COASTAL_ORDER INT NOT NULL, CENTRE NVARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, MFDO_AREA NVARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, TA_NAME NVARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, COASTAL_TYPE NVARCHAR(64) NOT NULL CONSTRAINT CHK_Triton_Coastal_Type CHECK (COASTAL_TYPE = 'Triton') CONSTRAINT UC_Triton UNIQUE (COASTAL_ORDER) )

rollback.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.COASTAL_LOCATION_TRITON', 'U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE ${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.COASTAL_LOCATION_TRITON
